tool_description: Extracts and structures eligibility criteria from clinical trial protocol documents, converting inclusion/exclusion criteria into standardized, queryable formats.

protocol_document.description: Text content of the clinical trial protocol document

therapeutic_area.description: Primary therapeutic area (oncology, cardiology, neurology, psychiatry, endocrinology, infectious_disease, other)

phase.description: Clinical trial phase (Phase_I, Phase_II, Phase_III, Phase_IV)

error_messages: Invalid protocol format: Protocol document must be non-empty text containing structured eligibility criteria sections.
Unsupported therapeutic area: Use one of [oncology, cardiology, neurology, psychiatry, endocrinology, infectious_disease, other].
Protocol parsing failed: Document lacks identifiable inclusion/exclusion criteria sections or contains unstructured format.
usage: Provide the full protocol document text and specify the therapeutic area. Optionally include the trial phase for more accurate parsing. The tool identifies and structures all eligibility criteria.

inclusion_criteria.description: List of structured inclusion criteria statements

exclusion_criteria.description: List of structured exclusion criteria statements

criteria_count.description: Total number of eligibility criteria identified
